articles.author: Chris Isidore
articles.title: So what happens to America’s 114 billion pennies once the US stops making them? - CNN
articles.description: The American penny isn’t going anywhere anytime soon.
articles.content:
The American penny isnt going anywhere anytime soon.
The US Treasury Department announced Thursday that it plans to start winding down production of the one-cent coin it has been minting for more th… [+2688 chars]
